text_paragraphs: Information Note on the Court’s case-law 15
Length of proceedings before the administrative courts: violation
The case concerns the length of proceedings before the administrative courts. The proceedings lasted 7 years and 3 months, including 5 years and 9 months before the Supreme Administrative Court.
Article 41: The Court awarded the applicant 900,000 escudoes (PTE) in respect of non-pecuniary damage and 250,000 escudos in respect of costs and expenses.
